items.title: VI Live: Volendam dicht bij ontsnapping, AZ tegen tien man Jagiellonia
items.summary: Deze donderdag staan de laatste vijf wedstrijden in de tweede ronde van de Eurojackpot KNVB Beker op het programma. Onder meer FC Twente, Sparta Rotterdam en FC Volendam komen in actie. Mis niets met VI Live!

items.title: Afgang Getafe in Copa del Rey, Athletic Bilbao ontsnapt aan blamage
items.summary: De Copa del Rey stelde donderdagavond niet teleur. Getafe verloor op bezoek bij Burgos FC dankzij een voormalig Eredivisie-aanvaller, terwijl Athletic Bilbao ontsnapte aan een blamage bij een derdedivisionist.

items.title: Coffee talk: Pep invites Brentford boss to debate
items.summary: Pep Guardiola has invited Keith Andrews to "discuss" the Brentford boss's claim that Abdukodir Khusanov should have been sent off

items.title: Kane: Only World Cup win would satisfy England
items.summary: Harry Kane has said that only a win at next year's FIFA World Cup will satisfy both the England team and the whole country.

items.title: Finalissima pits Messi vs. Yamal for first time
items.summary: Spain and Argentina will compete in the Finalissima on March 27 in a match which will pit Lamine Yamal against Lionel Messi for the first time.

items.title: H√∏jlund fires Napoli past Milan in Supercoppa semi
items.summary: A goal by Rasmus H√∏jlund helped Napoli book a place in the Italian Supercoppa final with a 2-0 victory over AC Milan.

items.title: RKC verpulvert Derde Divisonist HSC, De Treffers ook naar achtste finale
items.summary: RKC Waalwijk mag zich melden in de achtste finale van de Eurojackpot KNVB Beker. De Brabanders lieten geen spaan heel van Derde Divisionist HSC'21. De Treffers plaatste zich ondertussen als eerste amateurclub voor de volgende ronde, terwijl Volendam zwijnde tegen Genemuiden.

items.title: Agyemang is Young Sports Personality of the Year
items.summary: England forward Michelle Agyemang is named BBC Young Sports Personality of the Year 2025.

items.title: Napoli stuurt AC Milan via Neres en H√∏jlund naar huis
items.summary: Napoli heeft donderdagavond de finale van de Italiaanse Super Cup bereikt ten koste van AC Milan. Het duel in Saoedi-Arabi√´ werd opengebroken door ex-Ajacied David Neres en eindigde in 2-0.

items.title: World Darts Championship schedule and results: Greaves, Aspinall headline Friday
items.summary: The World Darts Championship is under way live on Sky Sports, with Luke Littler seeking to defend his title.

items.title: England boss Wiegman named Coach of the Year
items.summary: England women's manager Sarina Wiegman is named the BBC Sports Personality Coach of the Year for a second time.

items.title: Dit staat er voor AZ op het spel op de slotdag van de Conference League
items.summary: AZ maakt zich op voor de laatste speelronde van de Conference League. De Alkmaarders kunnen de volgende ronde ruiken, maar zijn daar nog niet helemaal zeker van. In het meest onwaarschijnlijke geval kan de ploeg van Maarten Martens zelfs nog uitgeschakeld worden.

items.title: Henry honoured with Lifetime Achievement award
items.summary: Thierry Henry is honoured with the Lifetime Achievement award at BBC Sports Personality of the Year on Thursday.

items.title: Van Gerwen in action after Chisnall beats Sherrock LIVE!
Will another injury derail Adams' World Cup prep for USMNT?
items.summary: Tyler Adams has been unlucky with injuries, and an MCL sprain suffered on Monday will rob him of valuable prep time ahead of next summer's World Cup.

items.title: AJ weighs in nearly two stone heavier than Jake Paul
items.summary: Anthony Joshua has successfully made the weight limit for his fight against Jake Paul but will boast an almost two-stone advantage over the YouTuber-turned-boxer.

items.title: Fernandes on his Man Utd loyalty: I want to get club back to where they were
items.summary: Bruno Fernandes has discussed his loyalty to Manchester United, saying he believes the club can return to former glories and win multiple trophies.

items.title: Debutants Munyua and Sakai stun at World Championship as De Decker hits out at crowd
items.summary: World Darts Championship debutants David Munyua and Motomu Sakai delivered stunning upset victories amid dramatic first-round scenes at Alexandra Palace on Thursday.

items.title: West Ham sack Skinner after one win in 11 games
items.summary: West Ham sack head coach Rehanne Skinner after winning only one of their opening 11 Women's Super League games this season.

items.title: Worst start in Old Firm history - how does Celtic manager Nancy compare?
items.summary: Wilfried Nancy is the first Old Firm boss to lose his opening four matches - can he recover Celtic's season and survive?
